评论详情: High quality

The image accurately represents the product.  The InCashmere 100% Pure Cashmere Women Poncho Sweater is a luxurious and versatile addition to my wardrobe. Made from pure cashmere, it offers unparalleled softness and warmth without being bulky. The lightweight design makes it perfect for layering during the fall and winter months. This poncho can be worn as a shawl, wrap, or stylish dress topper, adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Its high-quality craftsmanship ensures durability, making it a worthwhile investment for both comfort and style.  I highly recommend this product.
A gorgeous shawl/poncho that is the softest thing you'll own. Semi-sheer, it goes with anything and makes an outfit look polished.

This shawl/poncho is so light and soft. The blue and white pattern is really pretty - perfect for spring when you want lighter colors but still need to be warm. It folds down really small, so it will be perfect to keep in my work bag. Very nice quality!

评论概述: Soft but more of a scarf than a shawl
评论详情: First of all, this thing is SAWFT. Feels like you're touching clouds made of baby kittens. But I don't know that I'd call this a shawl, it's more of a glorified infinity scarf. This is definitely more of an accessory and not really big enough to keep you warm, but it's cute for like 2 weeks in spring.

The poncho is really well made and 100% cashmere, which I love. The cashmere is soft and smooth, and the color looks great. Even though it’s lightweight, it still feels warm. It has a nice, fancy look and would make a great gift for someone or for yourself.

This 100% cashmere poncho is not exactly how I imagined it. It has not the typical cut of a poncho I knew and I owned. It is more like a wide scarf sewn together. It also doesn’t have the thicker and very soft quality, I am used to. Yes, it is soft but since it is more on the thinner side, it doesn’t feel as cozy as I like it. It is still a nice piece, with some extraordinary pattern, but at that price point I would expect more. It took me a moment to figure how to wear it too.
Very nice poncho. Lightweight. Very nice pattern. Looks amazing. Very high quality. Highly recommend.
Made from 100% cashmere for a soft and luxurious feel. Is light weight and warm suitable for various seasons and versatile as a shawl, wrap, or dress topper.

评论概述: I ordered this Beautiful Cashmere Sweater for My Wife...and She LOVES It!
评论详情: AMAZON VINE REVIEW of this IN CASHMERE PONCHO SWEATER for WOMEN  When I first saw this beautiful cashmere sweater, I thought it would look lovely on my wife so I ordered it for her. For once, I was right and she loves it. I asked her to “review” it for me and this is her response.  “The quality is excellent – lightweight but definitely not flimsy. It’s a poncho, not a wrap, and the neck opening isn’t in the middle, so it drapes more on one side than the other. That’s not a problem; I just wasn’t aware of that until I got it. But it is perfect to dress-up slacks and a top. Unless you like showing some midriff skin, you definitely want to wear something under the poncho. I wish it were a little bit longer, but that is just a personal preference.”  “I got it in the Blueberry/White color, which pairs really well with white, as shown in the product image. But it also works great with black, which is my go-to color. This poncho gives me a splash of color, which I’ve been told looks good on me. So it’s been my go-to for both casual and dressy outings.”  Me again. She is correct, it really does look good on her and has kept her comfortable in restaurants where I was chilly in their AC. I am happy that she likes it…my choices for her do NOT always end so well.  The AMAZON VINE Review of the IN CASHMERE PONCHO SWEATER for WOMEN is FIVE STARS!  Five Stars for Soft and Luxurious Cashmere, Poncho-Style drape, Lightweight, Year-Round Use, and my wife LOVES IT!  For reference, “IN CASHMERE” is the BRAND NAME of the Designer-Manufacturer – Available at AMAZON  Thanks, AMAZON! Mark in North Carolina

Pros: - Made from 100% cashmere for a soft and luxurious feel. - Lightweight and warm, suitable for various seasons. - Versatile as a shawl, wrap, or dress topper. - Available in an elegant Boysenberry/White color combination.  Cons: - Cashmere requires special care and can be prone to pilling. - Higher price point compared to non-cashmere alternatives. - Limited to one size, which may not fit all body types. - The color may not suit all personal preferences.

I recently treated myself to the 100% Cashmere Poncho Sweater in a beautiful periwinkle shade, and it's quickly become my go-to layering piece for effortless elegance and warmth. This poncho isn't just a sweater; it's a luxurious embrace that elevates any outfit. The first thing I noticed was the incredibly soft and lightweight cashmere fabric. It feels like a gentle caress against my skin, providing warmth without any bulk or heaviness. The periwinkle color is both delicate and sophisticated, adding a touch of feminine charm to my look. The design is both classic and modern. The relaxed fit drapes beautifully over my shoulders, creating an effortless and chic silhouette. The open front allows for easy layering, and the ribbed trim adds a subtle detail that enhances the overall aesthetic. I've worn this with jeans, leggings, and even dresses, and it has consistently received compliments. It's a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. Pair it with boots and a scarf for a cozy fall look, or layer it over a dress and tights for a more polished evening ensemble. It comes in one size and offers a comfortable and relaxed fit. The cashmere fabric is delicate but durable, and it's recommended to hand wash or dry clean to maintain its softness and shape. Overall, the 100% Cashmere Poncho Sweater is a fantastic investment for anyone seeking a luxurious and versatile layering piece. Its soft cashmere fabric, elegant design, and beautiful periwinkle color make it a must-have addition to any wardrobe.

Don't know why the Amazon product options differentiates between "100% cashmere" and just "cashmere". When ordering the bright blue shawl was part of the "cashmere" only option. The tag in mine shows that it is in fact "100% cashmere" also & made in China. My shawl's such a lovely blue color. More like periwinkle blue. Just stands out and creates my outfit, when I wear it over a plain t-shirt and jeans or capri. Soft, lightweight, and comfortable. Not scratchy at all. Love the asymmetrical design of its hem. It hides my mama curves well.  Immensely recommended.

This cashmere poncho seemed like a great idea, but the "one size fits all" concept just doesn’t quite hit the mark. No matter how I try to style it, it ends up looking like a poorly crafted DIY project. I expected something luxurious, but it feels more like soft fleece than the high-end cashmere I was hoping for. It’s not as cozy or elegant as I imagined, and honestly, it doesn’t seem worth the price. It’s a bit disappointing, especially considering the expectations I had for cashmere.
Great light shawl, nice enough to elevate any look.

It feels soft and smooth like cashmere, and it probably is cashmere. However, it is rather thin cashmere. Comparing with another sweater I have that I know is pretty pricey cashmere (also Chinese cashmere, and got it at a relatively posh store in Shanghai), this is thin enough that you can see through the thread holes. I am guessing the knitting is not as dense as my sweater, and thread weave is not as thick. I love the silky smoothness, and warmth (for the thickness) of you sweater. This shawl/poncho, I am pretty sure is not of that grade, and is of 3 star grade. It still feels smoother than say the merino lambswool of my scarf though. I guess its ok for just a spring/autumn day accessory.

I purchased the red cashmere poncho, and I am looking forward to wearing it in the fall season, combined with jeans or classical black pants. The poncho is lightweight and feels luxurious against my skin. It's trendy and the fact that it's made of cashmere makes it one of my favorite sweaters. The material looks gentle so I will definitely hand-wash it to maintain its smooth texture. I intend to wash it with lukewarm water.
Poncho not pashmina. Super soft. Dry clean only. Light blue and white print.  Warm and cozy.

评论概述: Super soft and cozy cashmere poncho
评论详情: Lightweight, stylish, and super soft. Do wish it came in more colors than just pastels. There are multiple ways to wear this; like a poncho, scarf, or sleeveless sweater. For those who are adept at the scarf wrapping, this will be easy. It's 100% cashmere and has gorgeous texture. Not wrinkled and flows very nicely. Great for cool evenings or combating too much a.c. at the office. Once size fits all, but you can wrap it around to account for that.

评论概述: More of a dress topper than a poncho
评论详情: Pros: the cashmere is delicate, lightweight, breathable, but still warm. It's decent quality cashmere, soft with a nice, fine weave. Best use would be for a short shawl for your shoulders on a night with a little chill in the air.  Cons: Item is very oddly shaped. If you put it on with the V to the front (as shown in many of the listing photos), it's quite short in the back. Also, the "model" (the most used model looks AI to me) in most of the listing photos must be less than 5" tall and very flat chested, otherwise there's no way this would come down to her hips. I could never get it positioned in such a way that it looked right for going out in public. Every way I positioned it, it looked awkward. So, if you're taller than 5" and have a large chest, be warned.  Given the cons, I do not find it to be worth the price.

This poncho is easy to slip on over the head. It has a V neck shape. I like it so much better than wearing a shawl, because shawls tend to slip off the shoulders, but this just stays on. It’s so comfortable. The 100% cashmere material is soft and lightweight. It is not thick material; it’s light and airy. Also, the inner seams are soft without any itchy thread.  It is 100% cashmere. Made in China. I machine wash it on delicate and lay it flat to air dry.

I got this for travel. It folds up nicely square and it so lightweight. Its a muted pattern and popped on easily. I'm not always really good at making things like this drape well, and this just draped perfectly without any effort! I'm long waisted and it hit me nicely to provide a bit of warmth or just some style. I can tell this is going to be a "go to" for me at home as well as travel. It's not the softest cashmere I've ever felt, but it definitely feels like cashmere. It's a nice medium weight and like I said above it drapes *beautifully.*

评论概述: One Size does not Fit All
评论详情: What an odd concept one size is. I am not sure what they are basing this off of, but its not working. I don't understand how to wear this because either way I put it on, it looks like I took leftover scrap fabric and tried to whittle myself a poncho from it. I have never owned anything cashmere but its not as lovely feeling as I would have hoped, instead it just feels like really soft fleece, nothing impressive and certainly not worth the price.  It comes in really nice box, ready to gift but for this amount you can find a much nicer gift.

I am so glad I ordered this elegant 100% cashmere poncho. The feel is pure luxury and the style is elegant. I also love the fact that it is light and allows air to circulate while wearing it.  I really like this cashmere poncho to wear over a top when there is a little chill in the air.

评论概述: This sweater is lightweight and soft to the touch.
评论详情: The 100% cashmere poncho sweater for women. Lightweight warm knitted shawl wrap. All year round dress topper was obtained by my wife.  This sweater is lightweight, soft to the touch and is actual cashmere (maybe one of the first 100% ones we have had).  My wife uses it in the evenings when she feels the AC unit is "too cold."  It will certainly get a longer workout in the upcoming months.

Highly recommended as gift items for all your women friends. These are warm and wonderful and come in a variety of colors and patterns. I got the red which is a gorgeous scarlet--perfect for the holidays. This is the perfect topper for dress or casual situations where a coat isn't needed or desired.  I plan to buy more...

评论概述: Not as soft as I'd like
评论详情: This 100% cashmere poncho is a lovely addition to my wardrobe, though it's not as soft as I expected for cashmere. It's lightweight and strikes a perfect balance between warmth and breathability, making it an ideal layering piece for all seasons. Whether layered over a blouse on a chilly evening or worn on a plane, it keeps me comfortably warm without adding bulk. The versatile style allows it to be worn as a poncho, wrap, or scarf, with a neck opening that drapes nicely across the collarbone. It's also convenient for travel, packing small in carry-on baggage. Overall, a great product for year-round use.

This is a lovely lightweight poncho. The 100% cashmere knit is so soft and feels so wonderful against the skin. The simple construction allows the poncho to drape so gracefully and comfortably, and it provides just enough extra warmth without being heavy. It’s easy to pack and carry along for cool nights, too. Quite happy with it.

Got this for my wife and she loves it. This is what she said: This cashmere poncho is a luxurious and stylish. Its incredibly soft and lightweight fabric provides warmth without bulk. It also adds elegance to both casual and formal outfits. A versatile and timeless piece, it’s worth every penny.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for :)
评论详情: I read through the other reviews questioning if the poncho is really cashmere. All I know is that the one I received is super soft and feels very much like pieces I have from Eileen Fisher and ply cashmere. The length and size are good for me - I'm 5'8, 140 lbs. The color is as expected, but hard to get a proper photo of - the pictures I've attached show the poncho in regular interior lighting and sunlight.

This poncho sweater is a luxurious addition to any wardrobe. The lightweight cashmere material provides warmth without bulk, making it perfect for year-round wear. Its pink hue adds a feminine touch, making it a versatile and stylish choice for any outfit. Highly recommended for those who appreciate comfort and elegance.

InCashmere 100% Pure Cashmere Women Poncho SweaterThis sweater / poncho is a pale pink and one side has white stripes.  It is very soft and the material is really thin.  It's somewhat difficult to figure out how to wear it at first because of the poncho style, but it is elegant.  Because of the way it hangs down and how thin the fabric is I am afraid it may get snagged on something and be ruined.  I got this for my office because it is always cold, but it tends to get stuck on my clothing if I have long sleaves on.  It is very pretty though and I will likely use it for going out rather than in the office.

评论概述: Luxurious Cashmere Poncho, Lightweight but very Warm
评论详情: What a lovely and luxurious cashmere poncho.  It has a loose fit and I thought it was way too thin when I first received it, but the cashmere is very, very warm, I was sitting outside in the high desert wind with this poncho on and I was very warm.  It is not as soft as some cashmeres, so the yarn may be woven with some other fiber, but the poncho is very soft and not itchy at all.  I enjoy wearing it.

评论概述: Lightweight could come off as cheap
评论详情: Who can resist cashmere? This is a soft, pretty pink, but it's so thin, I'm afraid it reads as cheap. And it is economical as far as cashmere goes. Because we're already into spring, I won't have a chance to wear it until next year. It might be nice in early fall.  It's fine but not as luxurious as I expected.

This is a very nice quality cashmere poncho. The colors are beautiful, it’s very soft and cozy and if taken care of this will last for a very long time. This will look very cute with a multitude of outfits.

Lightweight and comfortable! I love this poncho! It's soft and warm and easy to wear without being cumbersome. It's very soft, and all the tags say 'cashmere', so I'm inclined to believe the assertion, but I'm not one who could tell for certain if the poncho were or weren't cashmere. It is lovely, but is also dry clean only. (As expected.) Now, I wasn't at all impressed with the packaging -- it came in an everyday gift box, the top part of which was gold-colored. There was an inventory sticker on the box itself, and the box was somewhat crushed in shipping, as it had been put into a shipping envelope, not a box. The poncho itself was undamaged, but as this poncho is perfect for gift-giving, be prepared to re-package it. I love that there is such a variety of colors and patterns with this poncho, and though the price is high, I think it's probably in the right ballpark for a cashmere poncho of this size and style. This is a great luxury purchase for yourself or a friend or loved one you want to pamper, and adding multiple patterns and colors to a wardrobe would be a fun indulgence. This poncho could be worn with any style of clothing, too -- with a dress or with jeans. This is a lovely, soft, versatile luxury purchase that would be a great addition to any wardrobe!

This is soft but I honestly don't think it feels like cashmere. I have other cashmere items and this just doesn't feel the same. It may be that its woven VERY loosely, in fact its somewhat sheer, but regardless, if it is truly cashmere, the quality isn't what you expect. I honestly don't think this is worth the amount of money they are asking for it. Bummer...I was truly hoping to love this and order it in more colors! It is very lightweight tho which is nice. It says "one size" but if you are a plus size, you will find this way too small.

I adore this wrap. It is super lightweight, and a beautiful light pink color with white stripes at the back on the bottom. It fully covers my arms which is something that I've been looking for, my arms are always cold and a wrap that covers them completely was something I've wanted for a while. It doesn't hang down low on the front or back of my body, instead going to around my belly button giving it an elegant but useful look. I really like this wrap and have already gotten compliments on it.

评论概述: Pretty Cashmere Poncho For Dressing Up or Down
评论详情: I love this poncho, which has more of an elegant shawl look. It's made of a light, airy cashmere and is perfect for adding a little warmth, whether over a casual outfit or formal. The pale pink color is soft and pretty. I'm not crazy about the stripes and would prefer it to be a solid color, but it's otherwise a very nice poncho. The stripes are very subtle anyway. The dimensions are just right for me, and I think it would work for nearly all body types. The neck opening is just the right size, to allow for it to be nicely draped across the collarbone. This is a timeless piece I think I'll be able to wear for years to come.

As someone who appreciates the finer things in life, I recently treated myself to the InCashmere 100% Pure Cashmere Women Poncho Sweater, and it has exceeded all my expectations.  First and foremost, the pure cashmere construction of this poncho sweater is simply divine. From the moment I wrapped it around myself, I was enveloped in unparalleled softness and warmth. The luxurious feel of the cashmere against my skin is an indulgence that I can't get enough of, making every wear a truly luxurious experience.  Despite its luxurious feel, this poncho sweater remains surprisingly lightweight. It strikes the perfect balance between warmth and breathability, making it an ideal layering piece for all seasons. Whether I'm layering it over a blouse in the fall or using it as a cozy wrap on a chilly winter evening, the cashmere's insulating properties keep me comfortably warm without adding bulk.  What sets this poncho sweater apart is its versatility. Not only does it elevate any outfit with its sophisticated draping and elegant design, but it also serves multiple functions. Whether worn as a stylish dress topper for special occasions or draped casually over my shoulders for everyday wear, this poncho adds a touch of effortless elegance to any ensemble.  The craftsmanship of this poncho sweater is truly exceptional. Meticulously crafted from pure 100% cashmere, it boasts superior quality and attention to detail that ensures its durability and longevity. I can confidently say that this poncho will remain a timeless wardrobe staple for years to come, maintaining its elegance and sophistication with every wear.  As a thoughtful gift for loved ones, this poncho sweater is unbeatable. Whether for birthdays, anniversaries, or holidays, it's a practical yet luxurious addition to any wardrobe. Packaged in a complimentary gift box and bag, it's ready to impress straight out of the box, making it the perfect gift for anyone who appreciates style, comfort, and quality craftsmanship.  In summary, the InCashmere 100% Pure Cashmere Women Poncho Sweater is a true testament to luxury and sophistication. From its unparalleled softness to its versatile style and exceptional craftsmanship, it's a wardrobe investment that I'm thrilled to have made.

This is a a one size fits all cashmere poncho. I’m 5’1 and 87 pounds so the poncho fit me a little big.  I forgot to take the tags off, but in the second photo you can see that the back of the poncho has white horizontal stripes on the bottom.  It is a pastel pink color. It is pretty thin and light weight, so I can see myself wearing it in the Fall, Winter and Spring. It’s not going to give you a lot or warmth, but it does give a very light layer of warmth. You can wear it a camisole or tank top underneath or with a long sleeved shirt.  The material is thin. I would have liked for the poncho to a little thicker, but besides that I don’t have any cons about it.  It is pricey, but keep in mind that it is made up of 100% cashmere which is an expensive material.

This is all of the things.  The only way to improve this is if it was washable, but it is cashmere so I just have to be careful while wearing it.  The color is vibrant and pretty.  It is very soft and comfortable.  I wear it all the time.  So nice!

I had high hopes for this.  Unfortunately, the fabric doesn't feel like cashmere at all.  If I were to do a blind touch test, I would guess it's polyester, not cashmere.  With the feel being everything for cashmere, it kind of loses the point.Also, the shape is weird.  Not that a poncho wouldn't work, but it's just not very comfortable.  Perhaps the design needs to evolve a bit more to be more practical.  Not a huge fan of the stripe pattern either.Overall, the product is not a good value at all if it's in the $80-100 range.  Better to get a standard cashmere scarf which is more versatile and usually better-looking.

I love a cashmere wrap. This one is very nice. I ordered the pale pink and it is a pretty shade -- no trace of peach or lavender. The listing pictures make it look sort of mauve. The one I got is a true baby pink. The cashmere is extremely soft and fluffy. It is knit, like a sweater, not woven like a pashmina, which gives it some extra volume.  Around the bottom edge are three, inch-wide, slightly off-white stripes. I didn't notice these in the listing pictures, although I see them now when I look. It is a lovely, flirty detail that I really love.  You can wear this as a poncho, adjust it to look more like a wrap, or drape it down the front like a scarf, which I think looks particularly nice with a coat.

评论概述: VERY thin but not bad otherwise
评论详情: This is billed as a lightweight cashmere poncho, and that it very much is. The pink you can literally see through. I have no issue with that, other than the price not reflecting that fact - which we'll discuss later. The thickness is about the same as a woven cashmere, but it's a knit cashmere, so you don't get the same density. It's about heavy enough to use in a slightly chilly office, or to have on a spring or fall (summer even in some places) evening to knock off the chill when the sun goes down.  The fit is SHORT. I'm a short person and it's about waist length on me with front and back balanced. I could get more length in back by shortening the front.  The cashmere is soft. I frequently do have issues with cashmere, and this one did not give me any itch or other skin problems.  The color is accurate as regards the picture on the screen. It's a nice baby pink color.  At the end of the day, the only thing keeping me from a hard recommend is the price. This is super, SUPER lightweight, and not a brand name (so no markup for the label, in other words). When I ordered, it was $99, and at time of review, it's $79. I think the $99 is a NO WAY and the $79 is closer but still not what I'd call a great value.  The reason it's still getting 4 stars is versatility. It can indeed work as a big scarf rather than a poncho by using it longways around your neck. In that way, it's a year-round item in any weather since you can wear it as a scarf with the big winter coat.  Side note - it absolutely feels like cashmere to me, and decent quality at that, but I have not performed any destructive testing (burn test) so I can't swear one way or the other.  Oh - and as to the no additional wrap needed because it comes boxed - that's a NO. It does come in a shiny gold shirt-type box, but there's a big old bar code sticker on the FRONT of it. You could cover it with a gift tag, but it's not placed with that in mind.

I have traveled with one similar (much more expensive) cashmere poncho for a few years now. I love it because it is light, packs small but is quite warm on a chilly plane (also great for walking around on cooler spring days). This poncho is comparable in every way to my current one except for price. This one is a bargain! The quality is exactly what I would hope for.

This cashmere poncho is just beautiful. It is lightweight and very soft.  I love that you can wear it different ways and it looks great with a casual pair of jeans or a nice dress.  I recommend this poncho for anyone that enjoys adding a little something special to their outfit or maybe if they just tend to get a little chilly. I rate this five out of five stars.

评论概述: Thin and soft cashmere poncho feels amazing!
评论详情: I didn't even notice that it had white stripes until I opened it.  This poncho will be perfect for when I get a light chill.  The light pink color goes with many of my staples, so I love it!
Very versatile Poncho, warm in the winter but lightweight to be worn as well in Spring and Fall.

评论概述: My 11 yr old granddaughter said I got it right! (Ju Ju)
评论详情: I didn't know what to expect when I ordered this type of clothing- but boy am I glad that I did! I am stretching out my comfort zone, so adding pieces that I wouldn't normally wear/style is where I'm starting w/ baby steps- lol. When I tried this on, my 11yr old granddaughter immediately told me how pretty it is! Here is "our" review: (1) its soft beautiful pink- not a barbie pink/ nor bubble gum pink- but a mature; yet not dull pink, (2) its incredibly soft, (3) its so easy to wear, just slip over your head and its on! This is a great assets for any age group and can be wear with jeans, slacks, skirts. Its perfect for date night, religious settings, weddings/showers, family gatherings. I'm doing a happy dance I love it that much!

This poncho is much prettier than I expected!  It's a medium-pastel pink, which suits my skin tone, and it looks elegant.  I've been looking for some kind of sweater to wear in church during the summer but will be easy to remove and carry when I step outside into the heat.  This poncho is just what I need.  The knit is even with uniform tension.  Where seams are sewn, they appear knitted as well.  Quality of materials and workmanship is excellent.  I tend to be size XL to XXL in blouses, and this fits just fine.  The short front and back work with this design, though I'd like to see those be longer.  I love how soft, warm, and lightweight this poncho is.

评论概述: Beautiful and light weight pure cashmere poncho!! Love it I’m going to order one in every color!!
评论详情: The most beautiful cashmere poncho!! Light weight and soft! Will order one in every color now! Love it !! Donna M
I love cashmere! This is made well and a cozy wear when it’s cooler.

So amazing how I received my cashmere poncho sweater so very fast. When I opened the package, I was so amazing with how well packed it was. My cashmere poncho sweater is trendy and adds a stylish flair to any outfit. It is super good quality, cozy, very comfortable and fits perfectly. Amazing!

This cape is definitely for all seasons!!! It’s light but adds that little bit of extra warmth.  Very classy and goes with any look.  The cashmere is soft and of luxury quality.  Fits well and goes with every style.  Definitely will be buying more colors and love the 2-day shipping
Skimps on fabric, looks cheap and as if it’s made from felt
This was a great find! It’s a soft, black cashmere sweater, which my wife typically appreciates and it already came gift ready! She really liked it and that’s what matters.

评论概述: Not what I expected but ok
评论详情: I was excited to give this a try.  I have never owned cashmere before.  This is not shaped like I thought but it works ok.  I am a plus size girl and was not sure this would even fit but I can make it work.  It is very thin more like a linen scarf.  Maybe because I am a plus size this is very short in the front and back so I will wear it more like a shawl.  It is soft but I would not wear it without something under it, both for my skin and to keep it clean.  If I had to buy this I would feel like I was over paid.

评论概述: Cute in front, size is awkward
评论详情: The material is nice...very soft and warm (where you are covered.) The asymetrical-ness of it makes it kind of awkward to put on. I prefer wearing it slightly off one shoulder rather than the V-neck in front. This way you don't get the definitive front/back length difference. I do like it, but I definitely think that the price that is being asked is quite high for the amount of fabric that you get for a true poncho.

This isn't bad, but it's too short in the back to feel really cozy on chilly nights.  We're deep into winter where I live and my central heating sucks, so I usually wear knitwear in the house. I often go with cashmere as it offers the warmth without the bulk, and while this cashmere feels very soft and warm I'm really missing the comfort that would have come if it extended to the small of the back. Throw in the fact that it likes to ripple a little in the mid back and I can only give this four stars. The material is soft and warm, but I just don't love the shape.

The color balance is a little off in  my pictures, and the color in person is a bit richer.This is a nice poncho style scarf type thing.  It is extremely soft and very nice to touch.  I'd rate it as a light sweater warmth.  So it's good for fall and spring, but probably won't be enough for winter.It falls nicely on me, even though I am a bigger girl (235 lbs).  I just wish it wasn't so expensive.

This cashmere poncho is okay. It's not the best quality cashmere- as far as softness goes- it's a bit scratchy and very thin. The size is adequate for me, as a 5ft 115 lbs female- it fits just right, so I'm not sure about the "one size fits all" claim. I think for the price, it's an okay value, maybe a bit over-priced.

This poncho is basically a shawl/thin scarf that is folded in half with a seam added that goes halfway up one edge. The seam does seem really delicate so be careful about putting too much stress on the seam. Stonewash is a lovely shade of blue that goes with almost anything. It's thin, but cashmere is very warm so that's normal. The fabric is very soft.
I am not crazy over this shawl. It is soft and very thin. It is longer in the front than the back, which I found odd.

I am very happy with the construction, comfort, weight and feel of this very lovely and well fitting cashmere poncho! They offered a great array of colors and the style is flattering and not too bulky but gives added warmth.  It is incredibly soft and stylish. Very giftable and great price for such a nice wardrobe staple!
This is so soft.  Got it in the pink.  Great consistent color throughout.  Can use for when cold or when to add to an outfit.  Very stylish and no issues.

评论概述: Much shorter in the back, not the softest
评论详情: At the time of this review the first photo of the color "Currant" (burgundy) is a photo of the back of the poncho. Also the tag is in the front of the poncho, so it took me coming back to the photos of someone wearing it to figure out how to put this on. The back is actually a lot shorter than the front. Personally, I think it is too short. I love the front though. If you are giving this is a gift, I would make sure the person knows how to put it on.  Now for the cashmere. I worked in retail for years so I know what quality cashmere feels like. This is average cashmere that is definitely not the softest. However, I have found sometimes you trade lightweight for softness.
